amendment.description: Amendment assures that if a new quota becomes available in certain Alaskan fisheries, a portion of it will be distributed to a vessel which currently has no qualifying catch history.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to include provisions regarding quota share allocations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
